JM-Lab/spring-ai-playground

self-hosted UI for testing AI models, prompt engineering, and RAG with Spring AI

Related repos

  • Agentic AI framework for Java, helps build chatbots, workflows, and multi-agent apps with Spring and Alibaba Cloud models
  • Automates testing using AI agents
  • AI agent testing framework with a UI
  • self-hosted interface for running and managing AI models like Ollama and OpenAI-compatible APIs
  • Open-source template for local AI setup
  • open-source platform for building and managing AI agents with multi-model integration

  • Web interface for multi-agent LLM applications
  • Discovers tools on demand to reduce token consumption
